trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented, animates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 抽象类，该类在实现时，进行动画处理<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Rotation3DAnimationBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Rotation3DAnimationBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Rotation3DAnimationBase"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Rotation3DAnimationBase"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取动画的当前值。

trans-unit.source: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画没有自己的起始值提供给动画原始值。

trans-unit.source: If this animation is the first in a composition chain it will be the base value of the property being animated; otherwise it will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain.
trans-unit.target: 如果此动画，则它将是正在进行动画处理; 属性的基值组合链中的第一个否则，它会返回链中前一动画的值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画没有自己的目标值提供给动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> which can generate the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress*> value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref>这可能会生成<> *1> 或<> *1> 值用于动画来生成其输出值。

trans-unit.source: The current value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取动画的当前值。

trans-unit.source: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画没有自己的起始值提供给动画原始值。

trans-unit.source: If this animation is the first in a composition chain it will be the base value of the property being animated; otherwise it will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain.
trans-unit.target: 如果此动画，则它将是正在进行动画处理; 属性的基值组合链中的第一个否则，它会返回链中前一动画的值。

trans-unit.source: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画没有自己的目标值提供给动画的目标值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> which can generate the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress*> value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref>这可能会生成<> *1> 或<> *1> 值用于动画来生成其输出值。

trans-unit.source: The current value of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 动画的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: 计算一个值，表示正进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由主机动画确定。

trans-unit.source: If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> that is not <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个组合链中此值将为快照值 （如果有的话） 或基属性值; 否则此值将为返回链中的上一个动画的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>不<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Stopped%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.
trans-unit.target: `defaultDestinationValue`是基本值，如果动画在动画的属性上的第一个组合层，则; 否则值为前一的组合图层的属性的动画的输出值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的原始值，如果动画没有自己显式设置使用起始值。

trans-unit.source: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用的目标使用的值，如果动画没有自己显式设置结束值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> that generates the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentTime*> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentProgress*> used by the host animation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref> ，用来生成<> *1> 或<> *1> 主机动画所使用。

trans-unit.source: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.
trans-unit.target: 计算属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of value this animation generates.
trans-unit.target: 获取此动画生成的值的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of value produced by this animation.
trans-unit.target: 此动画生成的值的类型。
